TitleNameSuffix.name: Software Title Name
TitleNameSuffix.sentence: Register 00h in the area not used.

InitialCodeSDKDefault.name: Game Code
InitialCodeSDKDefault.sentence: SDK default code (NTRJ) is being used.

RemasterVersion.name: Remaster Version
RemasterVersion.sentence: Illegal value. Register one of 00h-0Fh for official releases, and E0h for pre-release versions.

BannerOffset.name: Banner Offset
BannerOffset.sentence: Banner data has not been set.

RomValidSize.name: Effective ROM Size
RomValidSize.sentence: A value has not been set.

SecureCRCVerify.name: CRC of Secure Region
SecureCRCVerify.sentence: Does not match calculated result. The secure region may have been modified.

LogoCRC.name: Character Data CRC
LogoCRC.sentence: Does not match calculated result. The character data may have been modified.

HeaderCRC.name: ROM Header CRC
HeaderCRC.sentence: Does not match calculated result. The ROM header may have been modified.

Syscall.name: System Call Library
Syscall.sentence: SDK default is used for the system call library.

NandHybrid.name: NAND Application HYBRID Conditions
NandHybrid.sentence: Creation of HYBRID versions of NAND applications that do not support clone booting is not permitted.

NandLimited.name: NAND Application LIMITED Conditions
NandLimited.sentence: NAND applications that support clone booting are created as LIMITED versions.

OldDevFlag.name: Encryption Flag for Old Developments
OldDevFlag.sentence: This ROM is an application that supports clone booting, but clone booting cannot be performed on retail systems.

CapacityCardLess.name: Device capacity
CapacityCardLess.sentence: A value smaller than the actual file size has been set.

CapacityCardWaste.name: Device capacity
CapacityCardWaste.sentence: A value that is excessively larger than the actual file size has been set.

CapacityNandRange.name: Device capacity
CapacityNandRange.sentence: Not a specifiable capacity for a NAND application.

FilesizeFraction.name: Actual File Size
FilesizeFraction.sentence: Ill-defined value. Usually, the value is a power of 2.

UsedNandSizeLimit.name: Size in NAND Memory
UsedNandSizeLimit.sentence: The size of NAND region used by the NAND application exceeds 32 MB.

UsedNandSizeExceed.name: Size in NAND Memory
UsedNandSizeExceed.sentence: The size of NAND region used by the NAND application exceeds 16 MB

Seg3CRC.name: Segment 3 CRC
Seg3CRC.sentence: There is a data error in the segment 3 region.

TwlRomOffset.name: TWL ROM Offset
TwlRomOffset.sentence: The TWL normal region ROM offset (NA) and the TWL-exclusive region ROM offset (EA) must both be values greater than 1, and NA must not exceed EA.

DisableDebugSystem.name: Debugger Operation Prohibited Flag
DisableDebugSystem.sentence: Current settings can be analyzed by the debugger. If you are releasing the ROM as software for debugging, verify that there are no security problems in doing so.

DisableDebugUser.name: Debugger Operation Prohibited Flag
DisableDebugUser.sentence: Current settings cannot be analyzed by the debugger. This setting is not permitted.

ExtraRegion.name: Specific Markets
ExtraRegion.sentence: Illegal bit(s) are set. This setting is not permitted.

NormalJump.name: Normal Application Jump
NormalJump.sentence: Normal application jumps are not permitted.

RomSpeedType.name: Flags
RomSpeedType.sentence: ROMSpeedType is not configured in the RSF file.

RomControl.name: ROM Control Information
RomControl.sentence: Mask ROM is not available for TWL. Set as one-time PROM.

AES.name: AES Encryption
AES.sentence: AES encryption is disabled. This is a security problem.

WhiteList.name: TWL Expanded Flags
WhiteList.sentence: Flags are set that normally are not set. Check the settings configured at the time of the build.

ConnectIcon.name: Icon Display Flag
ConnectIcon.sentence: The wireless communication icon and Wi-Fi communication icon cannot be displayed at the same time.

LimitedStatic.name: Extended Resident Module
LimitedStatic.sentence: There is a problem with the location of the TWL extended resident module. Contact your Nintendo representative.

SCFGAccess.name: SCFG Settings
SCFGAccess.sentence: The SCFG register can be accessed.

TitleID.name: TitleID
TitleID.sentence: The game code does not match the TitleID.

SaveData.name: Public/Private Save Data
SaveData.sentence: With software intended for Game Cards, the size of Public and Private save data cannot be specified.

DebugBuild.name: Debug/Release Build
DebugBuild.sentence: This ROM is not the FINALROM build. Be sure to submit the FINALROM build of the ROM.

DifferentAppType.name: Application Types
DifferentAppType.sentence: This software is a {0} application. Not supported by this program.

CardAccess.name: Access Control Information
CardAccess.sentence: Cannot set the Game Card access method to both Normal mode and NTR mode.

SDAccess.name: Access Control Information
SDAccess.sentence: Access to the SD Card is not permitted.

NandAccess.name: Access Control Information
NandAccess.sentence: Access to the NAND flash is not permitted.

PaddingValue.name: Padding
PaddingValue.sentence: Last {0} must be padded by FFh. The limitations of {1} ROMs are not being observed.

ReservedArea.name: Reserved region
ReservedArea.sentence: An illegal value is included. Pad this region with 00h only.

Shared2Disable.name: Shared2 file
Shared2Disable.sentence: File size is configured even if access to the Shared2 file is not specified.

Shared2Enable.name: Shared2 file
Shared2Enable.sentence: File size is not configured even if access to the Shared2 file is specified.

Shared2AccessSystem.name: Shared2 file
Shared2AccessSystem.sentence: The Shared2 file (No.{0}) is configured for private access only. Verify whether access is permitted.

Shared2AccessUser.name: Shared2 file
Shared2AccessUser.sentence: Access to the Shared2 file (No.{0}) is not permitted.

Shared2SizeSystem.name: Shared2 file
Shared2SizeSystem.sentence: The file size of the Shared2 file (No.{0}) is {1}. Verify that the value is correct.

Shared2SizeUser.name: Shared2 file
Shared2SizeUser.sentence: The file size of the Shared2 file (No.{0}) is {1}. Verify that the value is correct.

SDKVersionOld.name: SDK ver.
SDKVersionOld.sentence: Does not match the version information registered for the program.

SDKVersionPR.name: SDK ver.
SDKVersionPR.sentence: You are using the PR version of the SDK.

SDKVersionRC.name: SDK ver.
SDKVersionRC.sentence: You are using the RC version of the SDK.

BannerChar.name: Banner
BannerChar.sentence: An illegal character set is being used.

IllegalRegion.name: Markets
IllegalRegion.sentence: The combination of regions is illegal. It has been loaded, but the Parental Controls information has been ignored.

AllRegion.name: Markets
AllRegion.sentence: All markets are set. Confirm that different markets do not require separate settings.

UnnecessaryRatingIllegal.name: Rating
UnnecessaryRatingIllegal.sentence: Cannot determine whether rating needs to be shown.

UnnecessaryRatingSetting.name: Rating
UnnecessaryRatingSetting.sentence: Selected if rating does not need to be shown. This choice can only be selected when the software is a kind of tool and not a game. Contact support@noa.com to determine if the rating does not need to be displayed.

RatingPendingSetting.name: Rating
RatingPendingSetting.sentence: {0}: "Rating Pending" has been specified. Re-submit when examination is finished.

RatingPendingConcurrent.name: Rating
RatingPendingConcurrent.sentence: {0}: A "Rating Pending" specification and rating age are both specified at the same time.

IllegalRating.name: Rating
IllegalRating.sentence: {0}: The rating age is not an age specified by the organization.
